mapper.sql: a.data_type_id AS "dataTypeId", a.maintype AS "maintype", a.title AS "title", a.icon AS "icon", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM data_type a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_type( data_type_id, maintype, title, icon, name, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{dataTypeId}, #{maintype}, #{title}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE data_type SET maintype = #{maintype}, title = #{title}, icon = #{icon}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE data_type_id = #{dataTypeId}
